title: NEW NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS COURSE WITH THE SWISS HYPNOSIS ACADEMY AND DR. MARCO PARET
description:
Dear friends of hypnosis, now you have the chance to learn the non-verbal hypnosis techniques to achieve better results in hypnotherapy. Learn the secret hypnosis primordial techniques: Mesmerism, Fascination - the power of the gaze, and many other techniques in the new international course of the SWISS HYPNOSIS ACADEMY with Dr. Marco Paret. 
BASIC COURSE: 05.10.-09.10.2022 
ADVANCED COURSE: 10.10-14.10.2022. 
Don't miss the opportunity to learn the most effective techniques from the best masters. Contact us at https://www.hypnose.academy/mesmerische_hypnose
We are looking forward to meeting you! Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.

Subscribe to our YouTube channel for more free lessons and useful techniques:
 https://www.youtube.com/user/neurolinguistic  

Join our Italian channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/pnlcoaching  

For any further information, please contact us at:
 http://www.marcoparet.com/contact
